Generate 25 high-quality flashcards on 'Proxy Signatures' (Topic Hierarchy: Level 1: Cybersecurity > Level 2: 001_Cryptography > Level 3: 005_Asymmetric 001_Cryptography > Level 4: 006_Digital Signatures > Level 5: Advanced Signature Techniques > Level 6: Proxy Signatures). Incorporate these elements: - Learning Objectives: [PASTE THE 6 OBJECTIVES HERE] - Active Learning: Inspire critical thinking via discussion/peer teaching/problems. - Scaffolding: Distribute cards across 4 layers: Foundation (5 cards), Components (6), Implementation (7), Integration (7). - Big Picture: Proxy signatures enable secure delegation in PKI for cloud/mobile. - Content Completeness: Cover types (full/partial/threshold), pseudocode (Mambo et al.), security models (unforgeability vs. proxy/signer/outsider, collusion), modern schemes (discrete log/bilinear). - Prerequisites: Link to digital signatures/asymmetric crypto. Ensure university pedagogy: Bloom's progression, active recall. Output ONLY a JSON array of 25 flashcards. No extra text.
